ygData.subject: Re: "A bit off topic...How do Dark"..why hassle that much?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, why do you go through all that hassle?  I walk through Freeport myself.  I haven t had any problems there.  Unless it has something to do with necs or
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, why do you go through all that hassle? I walk through Freeport
myself. I haven't had any problems there. Unless it has something to do
with necs or sks, I can't imagine why... I suppose if ya spent a lot of
time whacking the guards down it might matter, but apparently my faction is
fine and I can zip right through town with no problems whatsoever.
I haven't done any special faction bumping.. no quests, no killing any one
type of monster to raise my faction with the Freeport residents either...


"At 08:54 PM 6/18/99 -0700, you wrote:
>i don't know about faydark but to get onto the boat in free port is pretty
>tricky... until you find the magic secret. start going straight towards
>the west gate of freeport, then take a right... follow the wall while
>walking into it (walk diagnally into the wall) just keep going... it's a
>little while away... anyway you should soon find an invisible wall to walk
>through. finally, keep...etc..."
